trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around February 11th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out airplane window and saw a flock of shadows pass right around engine area thought to myself wow those birds came to close to the engine.. but took a second and said to myself wait birds cant fly this high. Next saw two round blurry but more sphere in shape fly by closer to window under wing of airplane it really got my attention, then one silver sphere with a red window flew right under the wing i saw it as clear as day i tracked it with my eyes and i know what i saw but could not think what it could have been so as i was leaving the plan just so know i wasent dreaming or something a asked the airline stuart what were those rounded sphere like objects maybe she would give me an answere because i know this would bug me for a long time not knowing what is was.. Hope this could be of any use thanks for listening.
Summary: Looking out airplane window on my way back from Memphis
